meanings.definition: The quality or state of being troublesome.
meanings.sent1: Her constant troublesomeness made it hard to relax.
meanings.sent2: The troublesomeness of the situation was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The troublesomeness of the mischievous puppy was actually quite endearing.
meanings.sent4: The troublesomeness of the storm mirrored the chaos in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The troublesomeness of the puzzle kept him entertained for hours.

meanings.definition: The tendency to cause difficulty or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: The troublesomeness of the new software update confused many users.
meanings.sent2: His constant lateness was a source of troublesomeness for his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The troublesomeness of the stubborn vending machine always brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The troublesomeness of the traffic jam was like a giant puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent5: The troublesomeness of the leaky faucet was a constant reminder of the need for repair.
